thread.section_title: PureFormulas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PureFormulas | www.pureformulas.com
thread.title: Customer Elaine Kelly
thread.title_full: PureFormulas reviewed by Customer Elaine Kelly

author: Customer Elaine Kelly
title: Customer Elaine Kelly
text: I have ordered twice from PureFormulas and have received the order within several days. They have a large choice of companies and products to choose from and I was able to find the products that are no longer available from our local stores.
